website_summaries.verdict: These fine-tuned headphones prioritize sound quality and purity.
pros: Enclosed earcups house 40mm drivers for an impressive acoustic experience
The steel body of the headphones is lightweight and natural, with soft leather earmuffs providing hours of fatigue-free use
These do not feature noise-cancelling electronics, but still filter outside noise quite well
cons: The headphones sound great, but the durability of the cord mount is lacking

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expensive headset
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace my expensive headphones until I could repair them. Found, to my surprise, that they were more comfortable and have better audio quality. I'm partially deaf and spend a lot of time watching videos on my computer. Using these headphones blocks outside noises for me and allows me to listen at a higher volume. My wife loves the silence!
customer_reviews.author: CharmY2K

customer_reviews.title: The Best Headphones for ME!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a transcriptionist and wear headphones to do my job. I have had high-end headphones and really cheap ones. I needed some noise-cancelling ones, however, and chose to try these Edifiers. For the price-point, they really are spectacular and much better than any high-end or made-for-transcription headphones I have had in the past. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price. A bit small though...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed because the headphones doesn't have too much room for my ears. It barely just fit and I don't think I have unreasonably big ears. It is somewhat comfortable but wearing this for long periods of time lead to some discomfort. Audio quality is pretty good. Overall: I purchased this hoping that it'll be comfortable for long use with plenty of room for my ears but it doesn't really fulfill that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Yu

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I've ever purchased. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones today and I'm completely baffled about how many good reviews this absolutely horrible product has. Makes me wonder if all the reviews are paid or just completely fraudulent. I was trying to replace some Sony noise canceling headphones, but found that after trying out these crappy headphones, I immediately fell back in love with the Sony ones I wanted to replace. The sound was watered down, not full, sounded like cheap $5 ones you could get from your local 7-eleven. The noise canceling was non existent. Horrible, absolutely horrible sounding, lowest quality headphones I've ever used. Absolutely disgusted with this purchase and that I actually believed the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are surprisingly comfortable. Place them over your ears and in a few minutes, you'll forget you have them on. The padding around the ears fits snugly to your head and stops almost all outside noise. I worked in electronics until I retired and you would need a better ear and more experience than I have to tell there is a better quality sound than these headphones produce. In my estimation, these headphones are way underpriced. I am very glad that I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son. He tells me that they are comfortable and the sound is good. We have had these for a few months now, and for the last few weeks the ear cushions continually come off. It is difficult, very difficult, to get these back on. This is my only complaint, but it is annoying and time consuming to get these cushions back on the ear pieces two or three times per week. I will be shopping around for other headphones without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Murlee

customer_reviews.title: good FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are cheap... i Bought them knowing that. they are made well, fit nicely, cancel out a good amount of sound coming from outside the headphones and get the job done. they don't sound really good but they sound decent. I bought them to wear wile I record drums so i can listen to guitar tracks wile playing. these headphones cancel out enough of my drum-set that i clearly hear guitar, vocals, and bass; but i can still hear what i'm playing on the drums. they work perfectly for what i needed them for but don't buy these expecting great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drown out noise at work. My coworker has the most obnoxious ring tone ever, and constantly is getting calls. While not noise cancelling headphones, these block enough background noise that I rarely hear him (or anyone else). The sound quality of the speakers is good and they seem to be well built. They are also very comfortable, so I can wear them all day without any pain. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Prickett

customer_reviews.title: Would advise against purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe all of the good reviews for these headphones. Maybe I received a bad pair but these headphone have an unbearable static noise. Just low enough to allow you to continue to use the headset, but just loud enough to drive you absolutely insane.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of headphones. These are over ear and comfortable with good sound including bass. I plug into my cell phone and use either the radio app provided or another app for radio and both work very well. Maybe it's because of the extra long cord (which acts as an antenna). Whatever -- I hope these will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keith

customer_reviews.title: comfy and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to listen to music while I'm working on the computer at home and cancel out the sounds in the room, i.e my roommate yelling while playing world of warcraft or whatever computer game he's always talking to other gamers through. I'm able to listen to music not too loudly on the headphones and still cancel out his yelling right beside me. They're a little bulky looking on my head, but the sound is really great and they're comfortable. However, they don't cancel out the sound of the room entirely when they're not playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I though even
customer_reviews.text: These by far are the best headphones I ever heard. Everything is clean and crisp. I thought that digital music had defined the limit of audio perfection, but with these headphones I hear things and nuances in songs I never heard before. Very good product and good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: They Rip!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones give great sound, they are well made, and the noise cancellation is good. But pair them with a decent headphone amp/dac and you will feel like you are in a car with the most banging sound system you could want. I got a spectra amp/dac, which is this tiny little plug. The difference has seen me playing through hundreds of tracks in my library. It's amazing! Booming bass that is tight and clear, clean highs and deep resonant mids. No distortion at max volume, which is now so much louder on my samsung s10+. My pc sound is now excellent. Movies, music, and games... oh the games!
customer_reviews.author: John Lavette

customer_reviews.title: A secret low cost hitter in the headphone game.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Sound quality is amazing and comfort is top notch. I’ve owned an expensive pair of Beats Studio 2’s for years. After the third time the hinges broke, and a one replacement headband, I’m threw them out and bought these. Sound quality is better on these at a fraction of the price. I’ll never buy another pair of expensive headphones again after my first impression of these. Noise isolation on the Edifiers are better than the active noise cancellation of the Beats with just the form factor. I love Dr. Dre’s music, but his headphones are highly overpriced and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Segraves

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the Music
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really good. They almost seem like surround sound, too. When I was watching a Youtube video that someone was talking in the background in, it seemed like they were standing behind me... kind of a weird effect. I bet they would be Great for gaming, too. I'm very happy with them! But, I'm a little worried about the way they fold, that they may get broken. I bought these to replace a pair of headphones that cord twisted into too much of a tangled mess, so I'm hoping these won't do that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear sound, strong bass without being overwhelming. Comfortable, snug fit, isolates sound well, fits a large head like mine, and covers my oversized ears. For $40, this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the money ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are remarkably good. I’m not an audio guy but for everyday use and listening they are well worth the $$. The sound quality fits my expectations and the extraneous noise deadening works well. If you spent $40 more it would probably be better but my expectations were a great overall quality for a cost that would fit my budget Two thumbs up from me. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Edifier stereo headphones
customer_reviews.text: Received the Edifier stereo headphones in record time, and put them to use immediately. Am listening to an audio book, and the sound, clarity, and, well, edification that comes forth from these headphones are wonderful. Had a slight hesitation when looking at the price, but that soon disappeared. These are quality headphones. Do yourself a favor and order a pair for yourself. Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: James P. OHare

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: I did not give these wonderful sounding earphones a five only because the plastic headband seems to be of cheap material and they do not look to be sturdy. However, the sound quality is excellent, especially considering they are not expensive. If care is taken, these headphones should last if treated well instead of tossed around. I like the long 10 feet of cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Great first pair to try
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad i got these. They were a perfect first pair and now I'll order others. I will always have these as a second backup pair. They do not cancel out noise very well but do an adequate job. They were also a little bit loose on my head and they have no tightening feature. I also found them to be very comfortable on my ears. My gf had a much more expensive pair of Sonys but couldn't use them after the first 30 minutes because they didn't go over the ear but sat on them so they hurt. I watched movies with them so they were just great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky DeNero

customer_reviews.title: The thing's a vice grip
customer_reviews.text: For $40 these cans provide amazing sound quality. The big downside for me was the massive pressure it put on my melon (head). I could only wear these for about 15 min till my face was red and ear tips purple. Perhaps I received a defective product, but I never EVER had this kind of experience with headphones. Usually it's just some or moderate pressure. I started my return within a few hours of use. If there wasn't the pressure issue, it would easily be a 5* review.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price (so far)...
customer_reviews.text: Early impression is that these are good quality headphones for the price-point. They seem comfortable to wear and appear reasonably sturdy, though the cord is thin. Ear-pieces swivel to lay flat for maybe a little easier storage. As expected, music listening with them seems decent overall so far, but probably not measuring-up to serious-audiophile grade, IMO. (A subjective judgment based upon limited use, your opinion might differ.) The over-the-ear design generally muffles outside noise -- but much more isolating when playing music through them. (They're not active noise-cancelling headphones.) Understanding that these are not expensive high-end headphones: Four stars overall, meets my specific needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is fine, the cord length is great
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine, the cord length is great. my only complaint is the ear cup shape/size. Maybe it's me but they are uncomfortable on my ears after 30 mins. They don't quite completely cover my ears and are a little bit to big to be considered an ' on ear.' headphone. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what yah need to enjoy sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have Edifier speakers for my music room so going with headphones for when my wife studies for her nursing exams was a 100% perfect choice! Comfortable. Great tone and amazing clarity. I love how it has just enough bass and doesn't over kill it. Perfect. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: michael a callisto

customer_reviews.title: Broke with normal use after one month
customer_reviews.text: My arm lightly tugged on the wire of the headphones, resulting in a broken device. Several reviews state this product isn’t durable, which appears to be the case. Arms will occasionally snag on cords, but this is the first pair of headphones that broke on me for that reason. And to happen so soon suggests poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good for me, considering I'm a cheapskate.
customer_reviews.text: Some of y'all reviewers need to learn that if you wanna be picky about something, it means you have buyer's remorse. Just buy the two bajillion dollar Bose-Sony headset next time, ya audiophiles. To the rest of us who aren't picky: Man these are great! My literal only complaint is that the cord is too long... HM STRANGE 1 STAR! 👹👺
customer_reviews.author: Matty Myers

customer_reviews.title: very good. not excellent, but very good.
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. very good for a 3.5mm headphone needed for an older device with no bluetooth option. as a collector of retro devices i have a variety of headphones. these headphones are a good fit for what i need. nothing fancy, just functional.
customer_reviews.author: TAO

customer_reviews.title: Sound is balanced and full
customer_reviews.text: Low and mid range amazing! All of my cans I run a headphone exercise app for 20 or so hours to add tonal response. Left and right marking on phones could be larger or tactile? Lines should be able to disconnect and one line out on left side?. Sound is comp to 1st gen bose.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Beat Studios!
customer_reviews.text: After shelling out $200 for my Beat Studios almost 3 years ago I did not want to make the same purchase as I had before. I had heard about these headphones from a friend of mine who said these headphones were cheap, great sounding and lightweight and these headphones certainly deliver. As soon as I played music on them I instantly fell in love they blocked outside noise better than my beats as well as having slightly better sound quality than them. These are definitely worth the buy over certain other name brand headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: This Head Set is just as good as the old Sennheisers
customer_reviews.text: This Head Set is just as good as the old Sennheisers! at a reasonable price. I notice they require less volume than the Koss semi over the ear. They do get warm. I listen to a lot of big band via Kendor Publishers. I get off into some kind of dream land, as I used to teach big bands in high school decades ago.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Ear cup snapped off after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in October 2017, so about 15 months ago. they worked great and felt great and sounded great up until today. Were my favorite headphones until the ear cup snapped off when I went to take them off just now. That kind of cheap quality is the reason I won't be replacing my headphones with another pair of these, I'll be looking at another brand. Sorry Edifier
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cooper

customer_reviews.title: The headphones were fine, so no issues with me
customer_reviews.text: The Edifier box was somewhat mutilated through shipping. Could be because of how thin the plastic is. The headphones were fine, so no issues with me, just saying, the box didn’t survive in transit. I selected these from Amazon after specifically checking a “noise canceling” filter. I work in a noisy office and am in need of a buffer between me and the noise. I can emphatically say that the H840 headphones have absolutely no noise cancelling effect whatsoever. This is disappointing since that is what I seek. I am no aficionado, but the sound is excellent with the H840 headphones and the build quality is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: I like this headset
customer_reviews.text: I like this headset. I have another that has been in service for a couple of years that does the job, but lacks the comfort of the Edifier. I also appreciate the prompt response and service of this supplier and the most courteous followup. Thank you so much, Edofoer Online.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Y.

customer_reviews.title: wii be purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pairs of these for my daughters,We have had Them1-1.5 yrs and they have been wonderful,now I will say that I have not bought many different brands throughout the yrs so I don't have a lot of experience for comparison .But was here looking to buy a pair for myself and decided to read the 1 star reviews and was shocked cause all 3 of ours are great and the quality of performance has held,as well as the cords and jacks, The only thing that has worn off is the thin layer of material over the ear padding on 1 pair has worn off,but all 3 pairs have been used just about everyday since we've had them
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Belair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality high, sound awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am greatly pleased with the headphones. I got them to use with my Casio Electric Keyboard so that I don't disturb my family while practicing. The sound and fit are perfect. Delivery delayed by my post office otherwise they would have been here on the day promised.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, for a pair of $40 headphones, they perform like they should cost around $100. The sound is clear and well rounded, with a fit that doesn't leave me with a headache after 12 hours of use at my work desk. They are noise ISOLATING, not noise CANCELLING, which is how they are advertised, so I still hear people in the office talking, which is honestly a good thing for me where I work so I don't get too lost in my own little world. the 3.5mm 6ft cable is perfect for whenever I have to move around and not yank it out of my computer, so good job all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my 2nd pair after last pair broke(My fault not the products). Loved the sound and bass. They will break if you run them over with your car ;-) Don't think they were built for that. I have big ears and these were very comfortable, a lot of over ear headphones hurt after a while. These do not. Great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good sound and that's all to care about in headphones. It is not an active noise-canceling headphone, but that's good, since oftentimes added amplifiers increased the distortion (THD). The over-ear design is comfortable and isolates outside noise pretty well. When music is on, you cannot hear what's going on outside, so you don't get distracted. All in all, I'm very satisfied by the product.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: No batteries needed. Oh joy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these headphones. They are so comfortable to wear and the sound quality is great. I was pleasantly surprised that they do not require batteries, I always hated my old ones for dying and I always had to carry spare batteries in my bag. The delivery out to Hawaii was fast and well packaged. I would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: These are a really great set of headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are a really great set of headphones for the price. I just love them. They are comfortable and light and fit perfectly plus they deliver decent sound quality. If you're looking to purchase a moderately price set of headphones then get these. You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: Noise-Isolating
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones. I must say however that the adjective "Noise-Isolating " is a bit misleading as they are no more or no less noise isolating than any other good over-the-ear headphones. In other words, these are good over-the-ear head phones, but there is nothing specific or special that makes them "Noise-Isolating " that I can tell. It doesn't even mention Noise-Isolating on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these after reading reviews. I've never found a pair of headphones that you could wear all day. But these come very close. And they completely block out the sound around me at work. I don't hear the lady behind me crunching her chips and humming all day. I don't hear people in the hallway outside my cubicle. The sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: H. Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine a week now and they are just great.Price wise I doubt one could do better.Build quality is very good and the sound quality is outstanding for this price bracket.Comfort is just right for me.A winner for sure.
customer_reviews.author: doug from cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for his XBox. He has used them regularly and they have been working great. He has no complaints as they do what he needs, he can hear the game and his friends and he can communicate with them as well.
customer_reviews.author: kynimom

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones. Poor design and cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. But they were flimsy and broke after a few months when I took them off. The connection between ear piece and head piece snapped in my hand
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Truda

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: They don't cancel out noise quite as much as what I'd hoped but otherwise they do work very well and are worth the price. Plus, I no longer have to share with my spouse which is an even bigger bonus!
customer_reviews.author: legolas007

customer_reviews.title: EDIFIER STEREO HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, in secure packaging. Usage of the headphones over a period of 48 hours, with excellent sound quality, for watching movies with noise cancellation as per the product description. The connection wire is an adequate length so that you can move freely around your desk. I recommend this set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Good head phones the cord is just very long and gets in the way
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit over my ears
customer_reviews.text: Great fit over the ears. Good sound. I just use them at my computer so I won't wake up my wife who is sleeping in the other room. I can use them with my speakers from the computer or my iPod. All good at a very reasonable price. I didn't have to pay $100s for a Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used my new headphones twice so far, so maybe it's premature to make pronouncements about durability. However, it seems to be pretty solid construction & materials. The headphones are easily adjustable and very comfy. They do completely encircle my ears which means (good) some background noise avoidance and (bad) they get a little sweaty. However, my Bose headphone also always got sweaty. I guess I just work out really hard hahaha. As far as the sound quality - I'm not an expert by any means, but they sound great! So far, I'm really happy with these all around.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Longer cord available. ?
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a longer cord to reach my TV its great for my phone and CD player. But also wanted it for tv that is further away. Can i buy a longer cord.??
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Too snug
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable after an hour of wearing. I noticed that, by itself, the left and right ear pads press against each other, whereas my older, more comfortable headphones, there was plenty of space between the ear pads. In other words, the ear pads are built to naturally want to come together, so my head feels like it's being squeezed. If all noise canceling headphones are like this, then I guess noise canceling isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly and perfect condition. Couldn't be simpler to use or operate
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and perfect condition. Couldn't be simpler to use or operate, just plug into any device. I only wish that there were controls on the headset to easily adjust sound and/or shut off. If one is stationary this is not a problrm but if moving/walking this is sorely missed. It is a great value for the money. Vendor was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Elayne

customer_reviews.title: They are nice because they are very light weight
customer_reviews.text: They are nice because they are very light weight. What makes them even better is they use a metal head band. Which means if you have a big head like me, you can bend them to be bigger so you don't feel like you have pliers on your head.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Decent cans but sound isolation is minimal
customer_reviews.text: I'd classify these as more "on-ear" than "over-ear" headphones. They sound OK but if you're looking for any amount of real world sound isolation, I'd skip these.
customer_reviews.author: Cary C. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Edifier H840 Audiophile Over-The-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones approximately a week ago. The headphones arrived earlier than expected. I'm satisfied with the sound quality, noise cancellation, and comfort around my ears. The price was competitive also. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: mdg321

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great head phones. Bought them for my husband that does a lot of traveling. Tried them on my self, super flippin comfortable. They cover the whole ear. He tried them out on his phone, I couldn't hear what he was listening too till he was standing next to me. Then he takes them off, he could go deaf they were so loud.... I loved the feature that they collapse. That was what drove me to them. They can easily slide into his laptop bag. They fit snugly on your head, too. They don't feel like they'd slip off when you bend over. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Really good all use headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones feel extremely comfortable and light on my head and don't feel like they would fall off. They don't fold down do I would not recommend these as commuter headphones. They work well for gaming, YouTube, and music. I could use them all day without any uncomfortable feeling. The bass is a little weak so the music experience is a bit lackluster but still decently clean.
customer_reviews.author: pehra564

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They don't drown out "everything
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They don't drown out "everything," but for the price they are excellent and a huge upgrade. I had a pair from a more familiar brand name that were ~$30 and I was getting frustrated that even with loud music, I could hear peoples' conversations in the office. I was nervous about these, figuring I may have the same problem since I wasn't willing to pay much more or go to the top line, but there are no concerns and the quality of the music is so much better with these. I'm pleased with the purchase and the money was worth it since I have to wear headphones to get focused on my work.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for the money. I wanted something that cancelled (or strongly muffled) outside sound so I could listen to music/Netflix on my phone/laptop and that's what I got. The cord is smaller like other reviews say, but it shouldn't be a problem if you're not aggressive with it. They're comfy to wear - fits my giant head and goes over my ears. The only reason I rated 4 out of 5 is because they don't fold up for travel. But really, I can make it work without a problem. Much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very good. It carries a nice balance and good tone
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good. It carries a nice balance and good tone. It also does a very good job at noise cancelling, at least in my opinion. The only thing that kept me from a 5-star rating is that I find them to be a tad uncomfortable around the ears. I have large ears, which may be part of the problem, but they don't seem to have as much of a cushion as other headphones. A very good product, regardless, and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: short life span
customer_reviews.text: teenage daughter loved them. comfortable and good sound. sadly the jack broke within 2 weeks -- so it doesn't matter how they sound or feel. bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable. Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable. Excellent sound quality. Not so much on the noise cancelation. Be sure to register the warranty BEFORE you dispose of the packaging. The serial number is only on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the value, fit great very comfortable. I am an audiophile listen to most of my stuff on vinyl, so I have I mean these don't compare in sound to some that are over a thousand dollars, I will try them with an amp but for day to day walking around and the gym they are fine much better value than beats or even bose.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: and the music is good quality. I won't pretend they're professional grade
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what I need them to do. They block out a lot of sound without being too isolating (good for an office environment, when you need to hear if a team member is looking for you but you don't need to hear about your neighbor's two daughters' travails in college), and the music is good quality. I won't pretend they're professional grade, but they're very good for the price; they're even comfortable. I tend to get achey when I wear headphones for long periods of time, but these work well for me. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E1701A

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear for extended periods
customer_reviews.text: Headphones arrived quickly and work very well for allowing practice on a digital piano without others having to listen. Very comfortable to wear for extended periods. Highly recommend seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this to watch certain TV shows because of hearing problems. Speech that was once muffled is now clear as a bell. Not much bass as some I have tried, but OK.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Summary
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good headphones, especially for the price. They're comfortable and as someone who dislikes ear buds I find these a far better alternative. The sound quality will vary for some. As a big heavy metal fan, I find the headphones drowns out some of the noise so I have to turn it up louder. Every once in awhile the headphones will give off feedback. Not a big deal because it's not that common but it might be an issue for some.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, greater price!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional headphones for the price. I work from home, and need peace in my office. Other (cheaper) headphones have performed the basic functions I need, but the sound leakage was annoying. For a mere $40, these headphones are everything the reviews claim them to be. I was prepared to purchase more expensive (Bose) soundproof headphones, but these perform exactly as I'd like them to. Don't get me wrong - I can still hear the kids yelling outside, but barely. I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Good value so far
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far. Durability unknown yet. Comfortable. Cord plastic could be smoother to reduce friction when trying to pull cord out from a tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Carpetshark

customer_reviews.title: New Experience
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "sound isolating" headphones. The audio is very good, not too heavy on the bass, which I prefer. The construction appears sound, so I look forward to years of good listening. I wish there was a R or L marker. If someone knows of one, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Casan

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They work great and are very comfortable, I purchased these head phones for travel and to listen to podcasts and books while traveling to Europe and wanted something comfortable and would help to keep other noise out. They worked fine. They are not noise canceling but worked well enough and especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: K Fortier

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality for the money. I've owned Bose for years but to my ears the quality of sound is the same!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Pruden

customer_reviews.title: good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones for the price. Fit really well over ears and cancel out outside noise fairly well so I'm able to keep volume lower. They sound great too, really satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: orion88

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. The ear pads are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the headphones. Great sound. The ear pads are very comfortable. He walks for exercise and can walk all day with his music.
customer_reviews.author: M. De Benedetto

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are great. They hug my ears and help keep a good amount of noise out. I wear them for long periods of time with no issues. Best value for the price. My second pair... because my family keeps borrowing them. I'll probably get a third.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Cisneros Teacher/Author

customer_reviews.title: ... Amazon package was on time with your product in perfect condition. Amazon prime is wonderful for me as ...
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon package was on time with your product in perfect condition. Amazon prime is wonderful for me as my travel and shopping is somewhat limited. I am 87 years old living in a senior care apartment needing to control my sounds at night. The Edifier H840 is new to me, of course; working great, comfortable, super hi fidelity and stereo. Just what I needed. Thanks. Tom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought another...
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They were given to me as a gift, and quickly became my favorite headphones. They pick up bass well and cancel some outside noises but not enough to shut you off from the world. After 2 years I stepped on the chord (they have a very long chord) and broke jack. It didn’t take long to decide to buy another pair. These are my go-to headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zesiger

customer_reviews.title: At this price this is a great  item
customer_reviews.text: I have just had the earphones for a few days, and only used them in test mode. They are comfortable, and do a decent job of blocking out ambient sound. That is the reason I ordered them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget headphones with superior audio quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones, for the price are amazing. They have beautiful audio quality almost akin to the earbuds that came with my Galaxy S8! The ear cups fit snugly around my ears and the band has enough room that it doesn't hurt the top of my head like many other headsets I've had in the past. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Box

customer_reviews.title: Peace at last!
customer_reviews.text: 40 hours a week, I live in a cubicle with some neighbors I'd rather not listen to any longer. Between the peanut-cracker on one side and the water-swisher on the other, and the near-constant bickering between them, I'd had enough. Today, for the first time in 6 months, I can hear myself think thanks to the Edifier H840 headphones. Having them on muffles the sound enough that I can hear only murmuring when I'm not playing music. When the music is on, they're completely drowned out and the volume is down pretty low. The sound is fantastic, too. Ear cups are soft and comfortable for long-term use. Thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The sound was equally as great. So far they have served the purpose well
customer_reviews.text: This head set cost approx. $100 less than the ones I had purchased at Wal Mart. The sound was equally as great. So far they have served the purpose well. I have not worn them for a long period of time, so it remains to be seen how they do on the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: robert anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quailty Is Suepiror
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and an extra long phone cord. Very comfortable over the ear fit. Appears to be made of good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Sogarr

customer_reviews.title: Good value, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely excellent value for the money. Bought them on sale for $32.00. Sound quality is excellent, and I appreciate the long cord. My only issue with them is their size. I wish they were slightly larger, as they are quite snug around my ears. Not enough of a problem that I would take away a star though. I would definitely recommend these headphones. Don't waste hundreds of dollars on a name brand when they are only slightly better. (I'm looking at you Bose)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit. Comfortable. Lightweight. Durable - looks like they will last longer than some headphones I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne O'Gorman

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, sound good
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these, one for work, and one for home, and they are the most comfortable over ear headphones I've owned. Sound quality is good but I'm no audiophile so someone else can give more feedback on that. The only issue I've had with these is the cord is long enough you have to make sure you don't run over it when they aren't on your head or plugged in, make sure to pick up the cord when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great for ~$30
customer_reviews.text: Great for ~$30, I'd say about 70% noise cancelling, and sound quality is what was expected. Not quite "Bose" in regards to noise cancelling or audio quality, but great if you want over-ear headphones for a decent price. Very comfortable and easy to adjust. I'd give it more of a 4.5, but am only able to do full stars, so I rounded up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a pair of hi-fi headphones, but these were a great set to start with. The sound quality is fantastic, they are comfortable, and the price is very reasonable! I listen to a lot of EDM, hip-hop and bass heavy music and these handle it all wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comofort and Sound on a Budget.
customer_reviews.text: I am headphone snob and my wife wanted a new set for work that did not cost what I would spend, very impressed with both the comfort and quality of the sound, these will not replace higher end headphones but on a budget the best I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: DroidBuilder

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable pair of headphones I've had in years
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of headphones I've had in years. Packaging was superb and the cord feel and length is perfect. The only con that comes to mind is that the sound is a bit lacking compared to a $20 pair of Sony headphones I've been using for 4 years. Definitely worth the very slight sound downgrade for how comfortable these are.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent earphones with sound that matches some of the best high end earphones I've listened to. Well balanced in all the ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh H

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of headphones that you just plug in and sit back and enjoy the music- these are better than expected! Highly recommend them for all of the above- noise cancellation and sound quality especially.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, not the best for a loud office
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers like to have loud meetings in the cubicle next to mine. These are great headphones but they don't block enough noise for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: mr1337357

customer_reviews.title: B+ Fantastic headphones. Best I have found for this price
customer_reviews.text: B+ Fantastic headphones. Best I have found for this price. They are equal to Steinheiser $100+ closed headphones I've had in the past. The acoustics, range, and "spacing" between instruments is great. Extremely comfortable and are compact when folded. Blocks outside sound fairly well. I purchased refurbished directly from Edifer here on Amazon. No wear I can recognize, except being open box.
customer_reviews.author: Jobo

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent! I reserved the fifth star after I see ...
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent! I reserved the fifth star after I see how long this lasts. I have had so many headphones just break off above the earmuffs. I sure hope these are different. I've only received it yesterday, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with these headphones overall
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with these headphones overall, the quality is great and they're very comfy on the ears. There's only two things that I'd say could be a bit better. The first one is that the wire for them is too long for my liking, it tends to get tangled or caught on things. The second is that the headphones are quite loud, and can be heard easily if you're nearby them. I'm content with them though, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, and my daughter is rough and they have lasted, which is a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie L. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Sound is clear, but broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: super nice and all the sound is so clear, Not noise blocking/canceling, but it does allow you to hear loud noises. After about 6 months of use, the left swivle pole snapped. I cannot fix it and sadly didn't get a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy adjustable and GREAT sound at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I really struggle with wearing over-the-ear headphones as I have 9 pretty large ear piercings. These don't hurt at ALL though! Others apply too much pressure and don't have enough padding so my ears end up feeling sore and the piercing is bothered, but I wear these all day during my 9-6 job and have zero issues!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bushor

product_meta.title: Edifier H840 Audiophile Over-The-Ear Headphones - Hi-Fi Over-Ear Noise-Isolating Audiophile Closed Monitor Stereo Headphone - Black
product_meta.description: Size:Without Mic| Color:BlackSuperb studio monitor sound quality made affordable The Edifier H840 Studio Monitoring Stereo Headphone is an incredibly low priced entry-level stereo headphone. These headphones are engineered to give you the most life-like audio quality. Featured with a simple, classic yet elegant style, exquisite material and workmanship, the H840s provide you with all day comfort. These headphones are made with an around-the-ear closed back design, which amplifies the effect of these noise-isolating headphones. Phil Jones of Pure Sound carefully calibrated these headphones ensuring a listening experience that sounds simply pure and clean. The H840 offers a rich sound and prominent bass. Altogether, these headphones have a high quality sound, are lightweight, durable, comfortable and affordable. Technical Specifications Driver Unit: 40mm NdFeB magnetic unit Impedance: 32Ohm - Frequency Response: 20Hz-20KHz Sound Pressure Level (SPL): 98dB Connector: 3.5mm stereo gold-plated plug Cable: 2m TPE Y shape cable Weight: 200g net Buy with confidence from world’s second largest manufacturer. Edifier is the world’s second largest consumer audio manufacturer. Despite not well-known in the US, Edifier has great market shares in Asia, Europe and South America. Edifier is the parental company of STAX, one of the most expensive headphone brands in the world. Edifier has incorporated similar technology and design concept into its consumer earphones and headphones, and strives to make the best sound affordable to everyone.
feature_bullets: Professional sound - 40mm driver units fine tuned for quality sound output in enclosed ear cups
Comfort matters - Ergonomic fit with over-ear design of lightweight body, comfortable soft leather earmuffs for prolonged wearing
Solid Build - Leather headrests with steel reinforced headband for flexibility and durability
Quality Connection - 3.5mm gold-plated audio plug with 6ft high strength cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,346 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
